title: Commentary on Jordan Peterson Biblical Series 4a, Why Sceptics are giving the Bible another look
description:
Why is Peterson motivating people to study the Bible and consider Christianity? I think you can find answers not only what he says but how he approaches the Bible and talks about it. 

Going old school with the Biblical Series Commentary. This time on Bib Ser 4 https://youtu.be/Ifi5KkXig3s 

No fancy this time, just watching through and commenting on what I've learned so far from Peterson.
